code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const stats=[{title:'Components',count:'3'},{title:'APIs',count:'2'},{title:'Resources',count:'2'},{title:'Systems',count:'2'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-8",children:"Platform Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mb-8",children:stats.map((stat,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-600",children:stat.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mt-2",children:stat.count})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-6 py-4 border-b border-gray-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-medium text-gray-900",children:"Recent Components"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"divide-y divide-gray-200",children:[{name:'Auth Service',owner:'team-a'},{name:'User API',owner:'team-b'},{name:'Payment Gateway',owner:'team-c'}].map((component,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-6 py-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-900",children:component.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:["Owner: ",component.owner]})]},index))})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
